Posts.Content: Jun 2, 2008 04:19PM luckyladyky wrote: to "I can do this" You said that your mother wished she would have had the surgery to make her care easier.  Just what did you mean?  How much care was needed and what was it? I sure don't want to be a burden to anyone and would really like to know just what care was required...but I will get a biopsy :))
